column4: hey... for some reason I can't get Gnome to work... it was working fine till I changed my emerald theme
more specific please--dont work doesnt do it
I changed my metacity theme... and my emerald theme... then pressed alt-cntrl-backspace... logged back in... but all I'd get was a black screen with an X as a cursor
lol... thanks **why didn't I think of that** :P
I can't check... nothing will load... oddly AWN and Pidgin both started properly (they're set to start when I log in)
this is ubuntu or ubuntu-based? and what other repos do you have in there
I'm using Ubuntu... I don;'t think I have any unusual repos...
I can run firefox still... nautilus and terminal don't work though... odd
you may not get an answer in less than two minutes ;]
we never leave--will be waiting for your return ;]
compiz can give you a better answer most likely

it's giving me a command not found error
